target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and developers who need to find available domain names for their projects
pain_points: finding names for products is maddening
good domains appear to be thousands of dollars
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Large enough market that someone paid $15,000 for a simple tool after 8 days

problems_validated.problem: Finding available domain names is extremely difficult and time-consuming
problems_validated.severity: High - described as 'maddening' and a major blocker
problems_validated.market_gap: No efficient AI-powered tool to find expired/available domains

products_tools.name: NameSnag
products_tools.use_case: AI agent that finds expired .com domains
products_tools.metrics: built in <36 hours, sold in 8 days for $15,000

products_tools.name: Bare Metrics
products_tools.metrics: sold in 2020 for millions, started from a tweet in 2013

products_tools.name: Claude with WHOIS MCP
products_tools.use_case: domain availability checking and naming suggestions
products_tools.metrics: can generate and check 200+ domain suggestions

business_strategies.strategy: Public commitment on Twitter to build accountability and generate initial customers
business_strategies.implementation: Tweet about building something publicly, then follow through with regular updates
business_strategies.expected_results: First customers often come from these tweets, provides accountability
business_strategies.case_study: Both NameSnag and Bare Metrics started with public Twitter commitments

business_strategies.strategy: Build and flip simple tools quickly for profit
business_strategies.implementation: Identify market need, build MVP in 24-36 hours, sell within days
business_strategies.case_study: NameSnag: idea to sale in 8 days for $15,000

problems_solutions.solution: Use Claude AI with WHOIS MCP to automate domain checking
steps: Ask Claude to generate 20 domain name ideas
Use WHOIS MCP to check availability
Get AI recommendations on best options

problems_solutions.problem: Naming products and finding available domains
problems_solutions.solution: Systematic AI-powered approach to generate and validate names
steps: Get AI opinion on best options

startup_ideas.idea: AI agent that finds expired .com domains
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Difficulty finding available, quality domain names

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Believing all good domains are taken or cost thousands
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing opportunities for great domain names
mistakes_to_avoid.example: There are available domains that are snappy and catchy for tens of dollars

growth_tactics.tactic: Public building on Twitter with regular updates

ai_workflows.workflow_name: AI-Powered Domain Name Generation and Validation
steps: Request domain names for specific use case
Get AI recommendations on best options
Iterate with more suggestions if needed
ai_workflows.use_case: Finding available domain names for new projects

metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Track from initial tweet to live product
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Use AI tools and public commitment for speed

trends_signals.trend: AI-powered rapid product development and flipping
trends_signals.opportunity: Build simple AI tools quickly and sell them for significant profit

actionable_quotes.quote: I find myself doing that a lot habitually where like if I think of something I'll tweet about it and then like that just brings up you know first customers a lot of times come from these kind of tweets
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing the strategy of public commitment on Twitter
actionable_quotes.actionability: Start tweeting about projects you're building to gain customers and accountability

actionable_quotes.quote: there is there are available domains that are uh snappy and catchy that you could get for ten tens of dollars
actionable_quotes.context: Addressing the common belief that all good domains are expensive
actionable_quotes.actionability: Don't assume good domains are unavailable - use systematic search methods

key_statistics.statistic: Built and sold a tool in 8 days for $15,000
Less than 36 hours from idea to launch
Bare Metrics sold for millions of dollars in 2020
key_statistics.context: Previous successful exit from Twitter-initiated project

meta.title: He Built MY Startup Idea and Sold It in 8 Days ($15K Side Hustle)
